commit message: Use getters in the Stats class
Move the PlayStats calculation into its own class and call it from both the sync service and the UI
Ensure the fragment is attached to the activity before apply the palette.
Remove an unneeded style on the collection filter checkboxes
Allow changing play stats settings from the play stats fragment
Play stats only refreshes with relevant preferences change
Update and notify the H-Index from the play stats
Improve query logic when games having completely synced (specifically their subtype)
